Package net.ssehub.comani.extraction

Class AbstractCommitExtractor

java.lang.Object
net.ssehub.comani.extraction.AbstractCommitExtractor
public abstract class AbstractCommitExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
This abstract class defines the methods to be implemented by and the common elements, like the global Logger, for each specific commit extractor.
Author:
Christian Kroeher

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected IExtractionQueue commitQueue
    The commit queue to which each extracted commit is send.
    protected java.util.Properties extractionProperties
    The properties determining the extraction process, e.g., the fully-qualified class name of the extractor to use, or the path to the directory, in which extracted commits shall be saved.
    protected Logger logger
    The global logger for printing messages.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AbstractCommitExtractor​(java.util.Properties extractionProperties, IExtractionQueue commitQueue)
    Constructs a new instance of this extractor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract boolean extract​(java.io.File repository)
    Starts this commit extractor for extracting all commits from the given repository.

    Starts this commit extractor for extracting all commits of the given commit list from the given repository.
    abstract boolean extract​(java.lang.String commit)
    Starts this commit extractor to parse the given string to a Commit object.
    abstract boolean operatingSystemSupported​(java.lang.String operatingSystem)
    Checks if the given operating system is supported by this commit extractor.
    abstract boolean versionControlSystemSupported​(java.lang.String versionControlSystem)
    Checks if the version control system specified in the configuration file of the tool is supported by this commit extractor.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • logger

      protected Logger logger
      The global logger for printing messages.

    • extractionProperties

      protected java.util.Properties extractionProperties
      The properties determining the extraction process, e.g., the fully-qualified class name of the extractor to use, or the path to the directory, in which extracted commits shall be saved. In general, this properties object contains all properties defined in the properties file, which start with the prefix "extraction.".

    • commitQueue

      protected IExtractionQueue commitQueue
      The commit queue to which each extracted commit is send. The same queue is used by an analysis for analyzing the extracted commits.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractCommitExtractor

      public AbstractCommitExtractor​(java.util.Properties extractionProperties, IExtractionQueue commitQueue) throws ExtractionSetupException
      Constructs a new instance of this extractor.
      Parameters:
      extractionProperties - the properties of the properties file defining the extraction process and the configuration of the extractor in use; all properties, which start with the prefix "extraction." as well as the properties defining the operating system and the version control system
      commitQueue - the IExtractionQueue for transferring commits from an extractor to an analyzer
      Throws:
      ExtractionSetupException - if the extractor is not supporting the current operating or version control system

  • Method Details

    • extract

      public abstract boolean extract​(java.io.File repository)
      Starts this commit extractor for extracting all commits from the given repository.
      Parameters:
      repository - the File representing the repository directory; never null and always a directory
      Returns:
      true if extracting the commits was successful; false otherwise

    • extract

      public abstract boolean extract​(java.io.File repository, java.util.List<java.lang.String> commitList)
      Starts this commit extractor for extracting all commits of the given commit list from the given repository.
      Parameters:
      repository - the File representing the repository directory; never null and always a directory
      commitList - the List of commits (commit numbers), which have to be extracted from the given repository; never null nor empty
      Returns:
      true if extracting the commits was successful; false otherwise

    • extract

      public abstract boolean extract​(java.lang.String commit)
      Starts this commit extractor to parse the given string to a Commit object.
      Parameters:
      commit - the string representation of a single commit; never null nor empty
      Returns:
      true if parsing the given commit string to a commit object was successful; false otherwise

    • operatingSystemSupported

      public abstract boolean operatingSystemSupported​(java.lang.String operatingSystem)
      Checks if the given operating system is supported by this commit extractor.
      Parameters:
      operatingSystem - the name of the operating system as provided by System.getProperty("os.name"); is never null nor empty
      Returns:
      true if operatingSystem is supported by this commit extractor; false otherwise

    • versionControlSystemSupported

      public abstract boolean versionControlSystemSupported​(java.lang.String versionControlSystem)
      Checks if the version control system specified in the configuration file of the tool is supported by this commit extractor.
      Parameters:
      versionControlSystem - the name of the version control system as defined by the user in the tools configuration file; is never null nor empty
      Returns:
      true if versionControlSystem is supported by this commit extractor; false otherwise
